ValidationRule.description: Prevent non Sys Admin from editing the Paychex Inc SA employee contact records. Added Safety DA - based on the HR Person Id field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNEW()) && NOT($Profile.Name = 'Insurance Compliance') && ( HR_Person_Id__c != null || PRIORVALUE(HR_Person_Id__c) != null) && NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "System Administrator") ) && NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "2008-09 HRS Premier Safety Delegated Admin") ) && NOT (BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "Salesforce Support") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** THIS CONTACT RECORD CAN NOT BE EDITED ****
